summary.span: 提供單一靜態的 方法 (多重多載)，該方法可用於受限制的 XAML 序列化 (Serialization)，將提供的執行階段物件序列化為 XAML 標記。

span.span: Provides a single static method (multiple overloads) that can be used for limited XAML serialization of provided run-time objects into XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所啟用的序列化有一系列的限制。The serialization enabled by this method has a series of limitations. 這是因為啟用的序列化是明確的執行階段，而且沒有可能的設計階段資訊的存取權以原始 XAML （如果有的話）。This is because the serialization enabled is explicitly run-time, and does not have access to possible design-time information in the original XAML (if any). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[序列化限制 XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md)。For details, see [Serialization Limitations of XamlWriter.Save](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/serialization-limitations-of-xamlwriter-save.md). 呼叫不允許在部分信任中執行時。Calling is not permitted when running in partial trust. 這包括從 Xbap。This includes from XBAPs. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化字串使用類別。The following example serializes a into a string using the class. 字串然後還原序列化為使用靜態方法類別。The string is then deserialized back into a using the static method on the class.
